name: @smile_identity/web-page
description: Self Hosted Integration for Smile Identity on the Web

scripts.copy: cp -r src/* build && cp cypress/pages/*.html build
scripts.build: for file in src/js/*.js; do esbuild $file --bundle --outfile=build/js/$(basename $file .js).min.js; done
scripts.build:dist: for file in src/js/*.js; do esbuild $file --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/js/$(basename $file .js).min.js; done
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:dist
scripts.prestart: npm run build && npm run build:dist

author: tams sokari <tams@smileidentity.com>
